data.name: AeonLabsOpenZWaveDBDeviceJson
data.value:
{"approval_requested":0,"approved":1,"beaming":"1","database_id":75,"db_version":6,"deleted":0,"description":"Smart Energy Switch","device_ref":"0003:0006","exclusion":"
  1. Put the controller in exclusion mode<\/li>
  2. Press the button located between the LED<\/li> <\/ol>

    If the Aeon Labs Smart Energy Switch was removed from the Z-Wave network, the LED will be blinking. If the Aeon Labs Smart Energy Switch was not successfully removed from the Z-Wave network, the LED will either be on or off (depending on if the switch is on or off).\u00a0<\/p>","first_approval_time":"2018-03-21 20:58:27","frequently_listening":"0","inclusion":"

    1. Plug the Smart Energy Switch into an outlet<\/li>
    2. Put the controller in inclusion mode<\/li>
    3. Press the button located between the LED<\/li> <\/ol>

      If the Aeon Labs Smart Energy Switch was not successfully included into any Z-Wave network, the LED will be blinking. If the Aeon Labs Smart Energy Switch was successfully included to a Z-Wave network, the LED will either be on or off (depending on if the switch is on or off).\u00a0<\/p>","label":"DSC06","last_approval_time":"2018-10-17 07:28:24","listening":"1","overview":"

      The Aeon Labs Smart Energy Switch is a Z-Wave appliance switch which can report wattage energy usage or kWh energy usage to a Z-Wave gateway. It can also be controlled by other Z-Wave devices to turn on\/off to save electricity when appropriate.<\/p>","protocol_version":"2.078","routing":"1","usage":"","uuid":"dsc06","version_max":"255.255","version_min":"0.000","wakeup":"","manufacturer":{"id":14,"label":"AEON Labs","reference":134,"uuid":"aeon","url":"http:\/\/aeotec.com\/"},"category":{"id":15,"label":"Power Outlet","category":"PowerOutlet","description":"Small devices to be plugged into a power socket in a wall which stick there"},"endpoints":[{"id":40,"number":0,"label":"Endpoint { "approval_requested": 0, "approved": 1, "beaming": "1", "database_id": 1040, "db_version": 8, "deleted": 0, "description": "Scene Capable Wall Dimmer Switch", "device_ref": "4447:3036", "exclusion": "

Put your Z-Wave controller into exclusion mode, tap the paddle of your new HomeSeer dimmer to begin the inclusion process. This will take a few moments to complete.

", "first_approval_time": "0000-00-00 00:00:00", "frequently_listening": "0", "inclusion": "

Put your Z-Wave controller into inclusion mode, tap the paddle of your new HomeSeer dimmer to begin the inclusion process. This will take a few moments to complete.

", "label": "HS-WD200+", "last_approval_time": "2021-01-30 00:17:39", "listening": "1", "overview": "

HS-WD200+ is a Z-Wave wall dimmer that’s designed for wireless on-oﬀ-dim control of connected dimmable lighting loads.

", "protocol_version": "4.061", "routing": "1", "usage": "", "uuid": "hswd200511", "version_max": "255.255", "version_min": "5.011", "wakeup": "", "manufacturer": { "id": 69, "label": "HomeSeer Technologies", "reference": 12, "uuid": "homeseer", "url": "http://www.homeseer.com/" }, "category": { "id": 21, "label": "Wall Switch", "category": "WallSwitch", "description": "Any device attached [] }, { "cmdclass_id": 15252, "commandclass_name": "COMMAND_CLASS_CONFIGURATION", "basic": "0", "version": 1, "nif": "1", "secure": "0", "nonsecure": "1", "config": "", "command_group": "APP", "channels": [ { "name": "config_decimal", "config": "parameter=13", "label": "Sets switch mode of operation", "overview": "

0=Normal mode (load status) 1=Status mode (custom status) 

", "deprecated": "0000-00-00", "id": 4590, "options": [] }, { "name": "config_decimal", "config": "parameter=14", "label": "Normal mode LED colour", "overview": "

Sets the Normal mode LED colour

\r\n

Possible values: 0-6

\r\n

0=White, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan

", "deprecated": "0000-00-00", "id": 4591, "options": [] }, { "name": "config_decimal", "config": "parameter=21", "label": "Status mode LED 1 Colour", "overview": "

LED 1 is the Bottom LED

\r\n

Possible values: 0-7

\r\n

0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

", "deprecated": "0000-00-00", "id": 4592, "options": [] }, { "name": "config_decimal", "config": "parameter=3", "label": "Sets LED operation (in normal mode)", "overview": "

0= LED ON if load is OFF

\r\n

1= LED OFF if load is OFF

", "deprecated": "0000-00-00", "id": 4593, "options": [] }, { "name": "config_decimal", "config": "parameter=4", "label": "Sets paddle’s load orientation ", "overview": "

0 = Top of Paddle turns load ON

\r\n

1 = Bottom of Paddle turns load ON 

", "deprecated": "0000-00-00", "id": 4594, "options": [] }, { "name": "config_decimal", "config": "parameter=22", "label": "Status mode LED 2 Colour", "overview": "

Possible values: 0-7

\r\n

 0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

", "deprecated": "0000-00-00", "id": 4595, "options": [] }, { "name": "config_decimal", "config": "parameter=23", "label": "Status mode LED 3 Colour", "overview": "

Possible values: 0-7

\r\n

 0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

", "deprecated": "0000-00-00", "id": 4596, "options": [] }, { "name": "config_decimal", "config": "parameter=24", "label": "Status mode LED 4 Colour", "overview": "

Possible values: 0-7

\r\n

 0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

", "deprecated": "0000-00-00", "id": 4597, "options": [] }, { "name": "config_decimal", "config": "parameter=25", "label": "Status mode LED 5 Colour", "overview": "

Possible values: 0-7

\r\n

 0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

", "deprecated": "0000-00-00", "id": 4598, "options": [] }, { "name": "config_decimal", "config": "parameter=26", "label": "Status mode LED 6 Colour", "overview": "

Possible values: 0-7

\r\n

 0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

", "deprecated": "0000-00-00", "id": 4599, "options": [] }, { "name": "config_decimal", "config": "parameter=27", "label": "Status mode LED 7 Colour", "overview": "

LED 7 is the top LED

\r\n

 Possible values: 0-7

\r\n

 0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

", "deprecated": "0000-00-00", "id": 4600, "options": [] }, { "name": "config_decimal", "config": "parameter=30", "label": "Status mode LEDs Blink frequency", "overview": "

Sets the dimmer Blink frequency for All LEDs in Status mode 

\r\n

 Possible values: 0, 1-255

\r\n

0=No blink, 1=100ms ON then 100ms OFF

", "deprecated": "0000-00-00", "id": 4601, "options": [] }, { "name": "config_decimal", "config": "parameter=31", "label": "Status mode LEDs Blink status (Bitmask)", "overview": "

Bitmask defines specific LEDs to enable for blinking:

Note: this decimal value is derived from a hex code calculation

based on the following:

Bit 0 = led 1, Bit 1 = led 2, Bit 2 = led 3, Bit 3 = led 4, Bit 4 = led 5, Bit 5 = led 6, Bit 6 = led 7

IE: value of 1 = first LED, 64 = led 7

data.comment: HomeSeer Technologies Scene Capable Wall Dimmer Switch (HS-WD200+)

data.name: HomeseerDimmerOpenZWaveDBFullOlderJson
data.value:
{"approval_requested":0,"approved":1,"beaming":"1","database_id":806,"db_version":12,"deleted":0,"description":"Scene Capable Wall Dimmer Switch","device_ref":"4447:3036","exclusion":"

Put your Z-Wave controller into exclusion mode, tap the paddle of your new HomeSeer dimmer to begin the inclusion process. This will take a few moments to complete.

","first_approval_time":"2018-03-21 20:58:27","frequently_listening":"0","inclusion":"

Put your Z-Wave controller into inclusion mode, tap the paddle of your new HomeSeer dimmer to begin the inclusion process. This will take a few moments to complete.

","label":"HS-WD200+","last_approval_time":"2021-01-30 00:16:41","listening":"1","overview":"

HS-WD200+ is a Z-Wave wall dimmer that’s designed for wireless on-oﬀ-dim control of connected dimmable lighting loads.

","protocol_version":"4.061","routing":"1","usage":"","uuid":"hswd200","version_max":"5.009","version_min":"0.000","wakeup":"","manufacturer":{"id":69,"label":"HomeSeer Technologies","reference":12,"uuid":"homeseer","url":"http://www.homeseer.com/"},"category":{"id":21,"label":"Wall Switch","category":"WallSwitch","description":"Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch"},"endpoints":[{"id":1141,"number":0,"label":"Endpoint 0","basic_class":{"id":4,"name":"BASIC_TYPE_ROUTING_SLAVE"},"generic_class":{"id":17,"name":"GENERIC_TYPE_SWITCH_MULTILEVEL"},"specific_class":{"id":1,"name":"SPECIFIC_TYPE_POWER_SWITCH_MULTILEVEL"},"commandclass":[{"cmdclass_id":10785,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_NO_OPERATION","basic":"0","version":1,"nif":"","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"MGMT","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10796,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_BASIC","basic":"0","version":1,"nif":"","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"APP","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10798,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_SWITCH_MULTILEVEL","basic":"1","version":3,"nif":"1","secure":"0","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"APP","channels":[{"name":"switch_dimmer","config":"","label":"Dimmer","overview":"","deprecated":"0000-00-00","id":3099,"options":[]}]},{"cmdclass_id":10789,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_SWITCH_ALL","basic":"0","version":1,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10797,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_SCENE_ACTIVATION","basic":"0","version":1,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"APP","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10788,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_SCENE_ACTUATOR_CONF","basic":"0","version":1,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"APP","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10801,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_TRANSPORT_SERVICE","basic":"","version":0,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"ENCAP","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10800,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_ASSOCIATION_GRP_INFO","basic":"0","version":1,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"MGMT","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10794,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY","basic":"0","version":1,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"MGMT","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10786,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_CENTRAL_SCENE","basic":"0","version":3,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"APP","channels":[{"name":"scene_number","config":"","label":"Scene Number","overview":"","deprecated":"0000-00-00","id":3097,"options":[]}]},{"cmdclass_id":10790,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_ZWAVEPLUS_INFO","basic":"0","version":1,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"MGMT","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10803,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_SUPERVISION","basic":"","version":0,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"ENCAP","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10792,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_CONFIGURATION","basic":"0","version":1,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"APP","channels":[{"name":"config_decimal","config":"parameter=13","label":"Mode of Operation","overview":"

Sets dimmer mode of operation.

0=Normal mode (load status) 1=Status mode (custom status) 

","deprecated":"0000-00-00","id":3144,"options":[]},{"name":"config_decimal","config":"parameter=14","label":"Normal mode LED colour","overview":"

Sets the Normal mode LED colour

Possible values: 0-6

0=White, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan

","deprecated":"0000-00-00","id":3145,"options":[]},{"name":"config_decimal","config":"parameter=21","label":"Status mode LED 1 Colour","overview":"

LED 1 is the Bottom LED

Possible values: 0-7

0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

","deprecated":"0000-00-00","id":3146,"options":[]},{"name":"config_decimal","config":"parameter=22","label":"Status mode LED 2 Colour","overview":"

Possible values: 0-7

0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

","deprecated":"0000-00-00","id":3147,"options":[]},{"name":"config_decimal","config":"parameter=23","label":"Status mode LED 3 Colour","overview":"

Possible values: 0-7

0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

","deprecated":"0000-00-00","id":3148,"options":[]},{"name":"config_decimal","config":"parameter=24","label":"Status mode LED 4 Colour","overview":"

Possible values: 0-7

0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

","deprecated":"0000-00-00","id":3149,"options":[]},{"name":"config_decimal","config":"parameter=25","label":"Status mode LED 5 Colour","overview":"

Possible values: 0-7

0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

","deprecated":"0000-00-00","id":3150,"options":[]},{"name":"config_decimal","config":"parameter=26","label":"Status mode LED 6 Colour","overview":"

Possible values: 0-7

0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

","deprecated":"0000-00-00","id":3151,"options":[]},{"name":"config_decimal","config":"parameter=27","label":"Status mode LED 7 Colour","overview":"

LED 7 is the top LED

Possible values: 0-7

0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

","deprecated":"0000-00-00","id":3152,"options":[]},{"name":"config_decimal","config":"parameter=30","label":"Status mode LEDs Blink frequency","overview":"

Sets the dimmer Blink frequency for All LEDs in Status mode 

Possible values: 0, 1-255

0=No blink, 1=100ms ON then 100ms OFF

","deprecated":"0000-00-00","id":3153,"options":[]},{"name":"config_decimal","config":"parameter=31","label":"Status mode LEDs Blink status (Bitmask)","overview":"

Bitmask defines specific LEDs to enable for blinking:

Note: this decimal value is derived from a hex code calculation

based on the following:

Bit 0 = led 1, Bit 1 = led 2, Bit 2 = led 3, Bit 3 = led 4, Bit 4 = led 5, Bit 5 = led 6, Bit 6 = led 7

IE: value of 1 = first LED, 64 = led 7

","deprecated":"0000-00-00","id":3157,"options":[]}]},{"cmdclass_id":10787,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_MANUFACTURER_SPECIFIC","basic":"0","version":1,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"MGMT","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10791,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_POWERLEVEL","basic":"0","version":1,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"MGMT","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10793,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_FIRMWARE_UPDATE_MD","basic":"0","version":1,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"MGMT","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10795,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_ASSOCIATION","basic":"0","version":2,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"MGMT","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10799,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_VERSION","basic":"0","version":2,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"MGMT","channels":[]},{"cmdclass_id":10802,"commandclass_name":"COMMAND_CLASS_SECURITY_2","basic":"","version":0,"nif":"1","secure":"","nonsecure":"1","config":"","command_group":"ENCAP","channels":[]}]},{"id":1606,"number":0,"label":"Endpoint data.name: ParameterWithNoOptionOpenZWaveDBJson
data.value:
{ "database_id": 5623, "parameters": [ { "param_id": 3, "label": "Auto Off Timer", "description": "Auto Off Timer", "units": "seconds", "overview": "

Automatically turns the switch off after x amount of seconds

0 = Disabled

1= 1 second

32767 = 32767 seconds

", "size": 2, "bitmask": 0, "default": 0, "minimum": 0, "maximum": 32767, "read_only": "0", "write_only": "0", "reinclude": 0, "limit_options": "1", "advanced": 0, "confirmation": 0, "id": 7247, "options": [] }] }

data.name: ParameterWithOptionOpenZWaveDBJson
data.value:
{ "database_id": 563, "parameters": [ { "param_id": 1, "label": "Power On State", "description": "Power On State", "units": "", "overview": "

When power is restored, the switch reverts to either On, Off or last level

0 = Returns to State before Power Outage

1 = On

2 = Off

", "size": 1, "bitmask": 0, "default": 0, "minimum": 0, "maximum": 2, "read_only": "0", "write_only": "0", "reinclude": 0, "limit_options": "0", "advanced": 0, "confirmation": 0, "id": 7228, "options": [ { "value": 0, "label": "Prior State", "id": 9873 }, { "value": 1, "label": "On", "id": 9874 }, { "value": 2, "label": "Off", "id": 9875 } ] }] }
